channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Test souris HP 785M : la MX Master à la sauce HP
item.description: HP vient chatouiller Logitech sur le segment des souris dédiées à la productivité avec le modèle 785M, qui semble s’inspirer en tous points de l’excellente MX Master 4. Pâle copie ou concurrente sérieuse ?

item.title: So Long, GPT-5. Hello, Qwen
item.description: In the AI boom, chatbots and GPTs come and go quickly. (Remember Llama?) GPT-5 had a big year, but 2026 will be all about Qwen.

item.title: In Cryptoland, Memecoin Fever Gives Way to a Stablecoin Boom
item.description: In a year that began with a memecoin trading frenzy, stablecoins have emerged as the respectable face of the crypto industry.

item.title: I’m an AI expert – here are my top 5 secret tools that could change your life in 2026
item.description: I test AI tools for a living –and while ChatGPT and Gemini are great for many things, these five are better assistants for everything from finances to cooking.

item.title: I'm slashing my streaming bills by 56% in 2026 – here's my five-step masterplan
item.description: Five ways to cut the cost of Netflix, Disney+ and more by selectively subscribing and cutting unnecessary options.

item.title: Panasonic 65Z95AEG : le meilleur TV OLED de l’année dernière casse 2 280 € de son prix
item.description: Sacré lors de nos Frandroid Awards 2024, le Panasonic 65Z95AEG s’est imposé comme le meilleur OLED de l’année dernière. Une fiche technique solide, un design maîtrisé et surtout cette volonté rare d’être un téléviseur complet, sans compromis, quel que soit l’usage. Aujourd’hui, il quitte les sommets pour redescendre sur terre : 1 719 euros au lieu de 3 999 euros lors de son lancement chez Boulanger. ...

item.title: This £315 Core Ultra 7 PC has 16GB RAM, 1TB SSD — Yes, this is probably the best PC deal of 2025 (yes, even for Pros)
item.description: I tried to find a deal that's better than this one but I couldn't find anything that's remotely competitive pricewise

item.title: The US Must Stop Underestimating Drone Warfare
item.description: The future of conflict is cheap, rapidly manufactured, and tough to defend against.

item.title: New Mac for Christmas? Try these 6 apps and games with your new Apple computer
item.description: Gaming on the Mac has never been better, and you’ll want to start using these delightful apps right away. Did your Christmas morning start off with a Mac under the tree? No matter if you unwrapped a new MacBook, iMac, or Mac mini, that hardware is just the beginning of a gift that will keep on giving. In 2025, there are more apps and games for Apple computers than ever. Here are six we recommend taking a look at....

item.title: Cette version spéciale du Xiaomi 17 Ultra se vend déjà comme des petits pains : voici les différences
item.description: Le Xiaomi 17 Ultra Leica Edition est une version un peu chère du Xiaomi 17 Ultra qui connaît déjà un succès en Chine. Voici ce qui le différencie.

item.title: Scammers hit Christmas cheer with fake wine and festive gift emails - here's how to stay safe
item.description: Holiday-themed emails increasingly carry scams using loan forms, fake order confirmations, and credential harvesting to collect sensitive personal and financial information.

item.title: Fujifilm's epic 40TB tape cartridge is here - despite what Elon Musk says, the future of offline data storage looks very bright
item.description: Fujifilm’s 40TB LTO-10 tape reinforces offline storage relevance as enterprises balance ransomware risk, regulatory demands, and growing AI driven archival volumes.

item.title: 10 must-read business books from 2025
item.description: The list includes books that cover Nvidia’s coveted AI chips and the greatest crash on Wall Street in history. From boardrooms to startup garages, leaders need ideas that work in the real world. These 10 books offer a broader perspective on business, helping us see the patterns behind the day-to-day grind.
